insert into product(prId, prName, pcId, prPrice, prInfo, prMemo, prImage) values(#{prId}, #{prName}, #{pcId}, #{prPrice}, #{prInfo}, #{prMemo}, #{prImgData})
mapper.select: SELECT rnum, prId, prName, pc.pcName AS pcName, prPrice, prImgData FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rnum, prId, prName, pcId, prPrice, prImage AS prImgData FROM ( SELECT prId, prName, pcId, prPrice, prImage FROM product ORDER BY prId DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo} ORDER BY prId DESC ) result INNER JOIN productCategory pc ON result.pcId = pc.pcId WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo} ORDER BY prId DESC
